00014 namespace BulletHell.System
00015 {
00016     /* Abstract game state
00017      * Possible improvement of a solid gamestate is to exclude NeedUpdate and NeedDraw from the abstract class; 
00018      * Using stack to keep game states for the game state manager.
00019      * These two variables has proven more trouble than help. */
00020 
00021     public abstract class GameState 
00022     {
00023         internal bool NeedUpdate { get; set; } // Determines if a game state needs to be updated
00024         internal bool NeedDraw { get; set; } // Determines if a game state needs to be drawn
00025 
00026         public GameState()
00027         {
00028             Initialize();
00029         }
00030 
00031         protected abstract void Initialize();
00032 
00033         internal abstract void LoadContent();
00034 
00035         protected abstract void UnloadContent();
00036 
00037         internal abstract void Update(GameTime gameTime);
00038 
00039         internal abstract void Draw(GameTime gameTime);
00040     }
00041 }
00042
